alert.note: Alert for Finney; Grant; Haskell; Kearny; Morton; Seward; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:25PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Seward, southeastern Morton, Kearny, southwestern Finney, Grant, Stevens and western Haskell Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 825 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Lakin to 8 miles northwest of Moscow to 8 miles south of Rolla. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Moscow around 840 PM CDT. Deerfield and Cave around 845 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southwestern Kansas.

area.areaDesc: Finney; Grant; Haskell; Kearny; Morton; Seward; Stevens
